mapper.sql: id, code, name, type, contacts, phone, email, contact_addr, status, lo, la, is_mixing, mixing_strategy_id, mixing_strategy, stocking_strategy_id, allocation_strategy_id, allocation_strategy, turnover_mode,turnover_attribute,tenant_code, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT w.code AS "code",w.name AS "name",w.type AS "type",w.contacts AS "contacts",w.phone as "phone",w.email as "email",w.contact_addr as "contact_addr",w.lo as lo ,w.la as la, case when w.is_mixing = 1 then '是' when w.is_mixing = 0 then '否' end as "isMixing",w.create_by as "createBy", w.create_time AS "createTime" FROM wms_warehouse w WHERE w.is_deleted = 0
AND w.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
AND w.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY w.id ASC

SELECT w.id, w.code, w.name FROM wms_warehouse w LEFT JOIN wms_ower_to_warehouse_relation wotwr ON wotwr.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE w.is_deleted = 0 AND wotwr.is_deleted = 0 AND w.status = 1 AND wotwr.ower_id = ${owerId}
